MIME element (text/plain)
Hello Abuse Team, 
  
I spoke w/John in your customer service area today.  
  
Here is the link. Please understand that they are allowing copy
protected software to be downloaded free of charge. 
 <http://www.ce4arab.com/vb7/showthread.php?t=71992>
http://www.ce4arab.com/vb7/showthread.php?t=71992 
 
  
Please note that the software these folks are hosting is copyrighted and
copy protected, these folks are aiding and abetting the culprits by
hosting this information. People involved have cracked the code and
posted our software as a free download. This is hurting our business and
our legitimate dealers throughout the world. 
Please help us shut them down, ASAP. 
  
  
  
Sincerely, 
  
Marleen Winer, Vice President, TeleType GPS www.teletype.com *
